desc: <tftitemrules>This humble hat can help you make, or unmake, the world itself.</tftitemrules>
name: Rabadon's Deathcap

desc: Bet that you'll win 3 or more of the next 5 combats.
name: Win More

desc: Bet that you'll lose 3 or more of the next 5 combats.
name: Lose More

desc:
Abilities can critically strike.

If the holder's abilities can already critically strike, gain @CritDamageToGive*100@% Critical Strike Damage instead.
name: Infinity Edge

desc:
Gain @PercentMaxHP*100@% max health.

Every @HealthRegenInterval@ seconds, heal @PercentHealthDamage@% max Health.
name: Dragon's Will

desc: After damaging a Shield, gain <TFTRadiantItemBonus>@DamageAmp*100@%</TFTRadiantItemBonus> additional Damage Amp for @Duration@ seconds.
name: Willbreaker

desc:
@MRShred@% Shred enemies within @HexRange@ hexes. When enemies cast an Ability, deal magic damage equal to @ManaRatio@% of the Mana spent..

Also, heal @MaxHealthRegen@% max Health per second.

[Direct damage item]
Shred: Reduce Magic Resist
name: Covalent Spark

desc:
Combat start: Gain immunity to crowd control for @SpellShieldDuration@ seconds. For @ASTotalDuration@ seconds, gain @ProcAttackSpeed*100@% Attack Speed every @ProcInterval@ seconds.


[Unique - only 1 per champion]
name: Quickestsilver

desc:
Heal the lowest percent Health ally for @AllyHealing*100@% of damage dealt.

Ally Healing: @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT_Tracker_Value1@
name: Hextech Lifeblade

desc:
Every 3rd attack deals @Damage@ magic damage and @MRShred@% Shreds @1StarBounces@ enemies for @MRShredDuration@ seconds.

Shred: Reduce Magic Resist
name: Statikk's Favor

desc: Once per combat at @HealthThreshold@% Health, gain a @ShieldHealthPercent@% max Health Shield that lasts @ShieldDuration@ seconds and gain @Stats@ Armor and @Stats@ Magic Resist.
name: Bulwark's Oath

desc:
Gain @ManaRefund@ Mana after casting.

When the holder gets a takedown, they deal @DamageAmp*100@% more damage for @TakedownTimer@ seconds.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]
name: Blue Blessing

desc: Combat start: Gain <TFTRadiantItemBonus>@APPerInterval@</TFTRadiantItemBonus> Ability Power every <TFTRadiantItemBonus>@IntervalSeconds@</TFTRadiantItemBonus> seconds in combat.
name: Urf-Angel's Staff

desc:
Attacks and Abilities deal @BurnPercent@% Burn and @GrievousWoundsPercent@% Wound to enemies for @BurnDuration@ seconds.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]
Burn: Deals a percent of the target's max Health as true damage every second
Wound: Reduces healing received
name: More More-ellonomicon

desc:
Gain @PercentMaxHP*100@% max health.

Take @AutoDamageReduction*100@% reduced damage from attacks. When struck by any attack, deal @1StarAoEDamage@ magic damage to all adjacent enemies.

Cooldown: @ICD@ seconds
name: Rosethorn Vest

desc:
Summon a large Voidspawn. Its strength increases with each Stage.

​​[Support item]
[Unique - only 1 per champion]
name: Zz'Rot Portal

desc: Attacks fire a bolt at a nearby enemy, dealing @MultiplierForDamage@% Attack Damage %i:scaleAD% as physical damage.
name: Runaan's Tempest

desc: Attacks grant <TFTRadiantItemBonus>@AttackSpeedPerStack@%</TFTRadiantItemBonus> stacking Attack Speed.
name: Guinsoo's Reckoning

desc:
Gain 2 effects:
  • @AD_NotStatBar*100@% Attack Damage and @AP_NotStatBar@ Ability Power.
  • @StatOmnivamp_NotStatBar*100@% Omnivamp.

    While above @HealthThreshold*100@% health, double the Attack Damage and Ability Power. While below @HealthThreshold*100@% Health, double the Omnivamp.
name: Fist of Fairness

desc:
Gain @BonusPercentHP*100@% max Health.

Every @ICD@ seconds, deal @BurnPercent@% Burn and @GrievousWoundsPercent@% Wound to an enemy within @HexRange@ hexes for @BurnDuration@ seconds.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]
Burn: Deals a percent of the target's max Health as true damage every second
Wound: reduces healing received
name: Sunlight Cape

desc:
Physical damage @ArmorReductionPercent@% Sunders the target for the rest of combat. This effect does not stack.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]
Sunder: Reduce Armor

desc:
Each round: Equip 2 random Radiant items.

[Consumes 3 item slots.]
@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT_BindOnEquipTRA@

desc:
Gain @BonusPercentHP*100@% max health.

Heal @MaxHealthRegen@% max Health per second.

desc: Once per combat at @HealthThreshold@% Health, gain <TFTRadiantItemBonus>@BonusMaxHealthPerc@% max Health</TFTRadiantItemBonus> and <TFTRadiantItemBonus>@BonusADToGive@% Attack Damage</TFTRadiantItemBonus>.
name: Sterak's Megashield

desc:
Heal allies within @HexRadius@ hexes for @MissingHealthHeal@% of their missing Health every @HealTickRate@ seconds. They also gain @AoEDamageReduction@% Durability for @HealTickRate@ seconds (this does not stack).

Healing: @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT_Tracker_Value1@
name: Absolution

desc:
Once per combat: At @HealthThreshold@% Health, briefly become untargetable and shed negative effects. Then, heal @MissingHealthRestore*100@% missing health and gain @AttackSpeed@% bonus Attack Speed.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]

Burn: Deals a percent of the target's max Health as true damage every second

desc: Every @CastPeriod@ seconds, a random Anima Squad champion spawns a whirl of Tornadoes, dealing magic damage.

desc: Every @CastPeriod@ seconds, a random Anima Squad champion fires Searing Shortbow, shooting an arrow that leaves an area that deals magic damage over time.

desc:
Execute enemies below @ExecuteThresholdPercent*100@% Health. Abilities can critically strike. Gain @RedundantCritDamage*100@% Critical Strike Damage.

All Shields are @ShieldEffectivenessPercent*100@% more effective on the holder. Every @SiphonFrequency@ seconds, siphon @HealthSiphonAmt*100@% of the owner's max Health from the current target and convert it to a Shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds.

Every @ShieldRate@ seconds, grant a @BaseShieldAmount@-@MaxShield@ Shield (based on Stage) to the @ShieldTargets@ lowest percent health allies for @ShieldDuration@ seconds.

desc:
Your team gains +@MaxArmySizeIncrease@ max team size.

"...the Heart of a hero..."
name: Tactician's Crown

desc:
Combat start: Grant @ASBuff@% Attack Speed and @BonusResists@ Armor and Magic Resist to the holder, adjacent allies in the same row, and all allies behind them for @BuffDuration@ seconds.

​​[Support item]
name: Aegis of the Legion

desc:
Combat start: Gain immunity to crowd control for @SpellShieldDuration@ seconds. During this time, gain @ProcAttackSpeed*100@% Attack Speed every @ProcInterval@ seconds.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]
name: Quicksilver

desc: <tftitemrules>Perfect peace and calm for the holder - and all who face it.</tftitemrules>
name: Deathblade

desc:
Combat start: Grant @ChaliceAP@ Ability Power and @BonusInitialMana@ Mana to the holder and allies within 2 hexes in the same row.

​​[Support item]
name: Chalice of Power

desc:

The holder's Attack Speed is locked at @AttackSpeedCap@.
